Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a book within a library program where books can be checked out and then returned. Holds private member variables for title, author, and whether or not it is available to be checked out. Note: All Books are under the genre "YA Fiction"

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int booksOnPlatform
      A running tally of the number of Books that have been created
      static java.lang.String GENRE
      All books on the platform share the same genre of "YA Fiction"

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Book()
      Default Constructor creates an object for the book "The Color Purple" by Alice Walker.
      Book(Book bookToCopy)
      Copy Constructor creates a duplicate of a given Book Object
      Book(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String author)
      Overloaded Constructor accepts values for the Book's title and author

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • Book

        public Book()
        Default Constructor creates an object for the book "The Color Purple" by Alice Walker. (all books are immeditaley availavle to rent after creation)

      • Book

        public Book(java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String author)
        Overloaded Constructor accepts values for the Book's title and author
        Parameters:
        title - the String representation of the book's title
        author - the String representation of the book's author (if multiple, pass in a comma separated String of names)

      • Book

        public Book(Book bookToCopy)
        Copy Constructor creates a duplicate of a given Book Object
        Parameters:
        bookToCopy - the Book of which to make a copy

    • Method Detail

        Returns:

      • setAuthor

        public void setAuthor(java.lang.String newAuthor)
        Accessor for the book's author
        Parameters:
        newAuthor - the new Author of the book (if multiple, provide a comma separated String of names)

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Accessor for whether or not the book is currently available to rent
        Returns:
        true if available, false if unavailable

      • setAvailable

        public void setAvailable(boolean availability)
        Mutator for the current availability of the Book
        Parameters:
        availability - true if the book is available, false if not

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a textual representation of the Book including all private member variables and a decorative border
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the textual representation of the book as a String

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares a Book to another Object. Two Books are equal if they share the same title and author. Availability is not considered as a measure of equivalence.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - the Object to compare to this Book
        Returns:
        true if the two Books are the same, false if not
